title: Requiring the Speaker of the Assembly to appoint a two person committee to inform the Governor the Assembly is ready to proceed with business
fulltext:
ASSEMBLY  RESOLUTION  establishing  a  committee of the Assembly to wait
upon the Governor

RESOLVED, That a committee of two be appointed by the  Speaker  to  wait
upon  the  Governor  and inform him of the election of Sheldon Silver as
Speaker of the Assembly and that the Assembly is organized and ready  to
proceed with business.
